column1: Bavette's Bar & Boeuf////Love everything about this place from the good to the atmosphere and service. Every time we go
column2: we are greeted by friendly host staff
column3: waited on by professional servers who are always helpful and knowledgeable about pairings
column4: and then there's the food. Absolutely love everything we've tried from the filet mignon to the elotes to even the burger
column6: and sea salted caramel gelato. Can't wait to dine with them again soon!
